intro:
JALECOlle Famicom Ver. brings back classic Jaleco titles!
Vol. 7: Saiyuuki World II - The Demon God of Heaven - & WHOMP'EM
description:
Seek the seven Totems and harness their power!
Strike down the creatures that stand in your way
with your spear and Totem skills!
A stage-select action adventure awaits!

【Game Story】
A young warrior from a native tribe embarks on a journey to retrieve seven lost Totems in this side-scrolling action adventure.

Players control Soaring Eagle as he explores eight distinct stages. After clearing the first stage, the remaining six can be tackled in any order via a stage-select system. Each stage is guarded by a powerful boss and defeating them grants new Totem abilities.

These Totems provide more than just offensive power—they enable new ways to move and interact with the world. Choosing which stage to conquer first can dramatically change your strategy and difficulty.

With tight platforming, intense combat and clever traps, WHOMP'EM challenges players to master both their spear and the special abilities earned along the way.

★Includes the original version: Saiyuuki World II – The Demon God of Heaven in a 2-in-1 package!
– Saiyuuki World II & WHOMP'EM <New Features> –
★Attack info
View all acquired actions and their effects anytime.
★Remaining Gourds
See how many more you need to get +1 Life.

JALECOlle Common <New Features>
★Beginner-friendly rescue features
Now includes "Rewind" to quickly undo mistakes and "Quick Save & Load" to save and resume the game at any time.
★Convenient Subtitle Guide
Assisting with the English localization of Saiyuuki WorldⅡ.
★Record your best time
Now includes a "Simple Timer" to record the time from the beginning of the adventure to the defeat of the final boss. 
You can aim for your best time while using Quick Save. Take on the challenge seriously without any rescue features. 
Record your best time!
★Packed with many more enjoyable features and options!
- Now includes new achievements to challenge various in-game objectives.
- Explore the gallery page to view package designs, manuals, flyers and more from the original releases.
- Screen edge options to reduce screen distortion.
- Screen Filter option.
- Wallpaper options.
- Upon completing the main game, you'll unlock a special bonus feature as a reward.
